courses.title: Web Fundamentals

description.it: Scopri come creare pagine web moderne e interattive partendo dalle basi! Questo corso ti guiderà nell’apprendimento di HTML, CSS e JavaScript, i tre pilastri fondamentali del web development. Imparerai a costruire pagine ben strutturate con HTML, a renderle esteticamente accattivanti con CSS e a renderle dinamiche e interattive grazie a JavaScript. Perfetto per chi vuole avvicinarsi alla programmazione web, sia per hobby che per lavoro. Alla fine del corso, sarai in grado di realizzare siti web responsivi e funzionali, pronti per essere pubblicati online!
description.en: Learn how to create modern and interactive web pages from scratch! This course will guide you through learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, the three fundamental pillars of web development. You will learn to build well-structured pages with HTML, make them visually appealing with CSS, and make them dynamic and interactive with JavaScript. Perfect for those who want to get into web programming, either as a hobby or for work. By the end of the course, you will be able to create responsive and functional websites, ready to be published online!
description.es: Aprende a crear páginas web modernas e interactivas desde cero! Este curso te guiará en el aprendizaje de HTML, CSS y JavaScript, los tres pilares fundamentales del desarrollo web. Aprenderás a construir páginas bien estructuradas con HTML, hacerlas visualmente atractivas con CSS y hacerlas dinámicas e interactivas con JavaScript. Perfecto para aquellos que quieren iniciarse en la programación web, ya sea como hobby o para trabajar. Al final del curso, serás capaz de crear sitios web responsivos y funcionales, listos para ser publicados en línea!

courses.time: The course is available from 6:00 PM
courses.nature: Learn to create modern web pages with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

courses.title: Generative AI

description.it: Comprendere i modelli di AI Generativa, le loro applicazioni aziendali e le implicazioni etiche e di sicurezza.
description.en: Understand Generative AI models, their business applications, and ethical and security implications.
description.es: Comprender los modelos de IA Generativa, sus aplicaciones empresariales y las implicaciones éticas y de seguridad.

courses.time: The course is available from 6:00 PM
courses.nature: Discover Generative AI models and their business applications.

courses.title: Cyber Security (CompTIA Security+)

description.it: Acquisisci le competenze essenziali della sicurezza informatica per proteggere reti e dati da minacce esterne, imparando strategie efficaci di difesa e prevenzione degli attacchi.
description.en: Acquire essential cybersecurity skills to protect networks and data from external threats, learning effective defense and attack prevention strategies.
description.es: Adquiere habilidades esenciales de ciberseguridad para proteger redes y datos de amenazas externas, aprendiendo estrategias efectivas de defensa y prevención de ataques.

courses.time: The course is available from 6:00 PM
courses.nature: Acquire essential cybersecurity skills to protect networks and data from external threats, learning effective defense and attack prevention strategies.

courses.title: Agile Methodologies

description.it: Scopri i segreti dell’Intelligenza Artificiale e dei sistemi che ti permetteranno di proiettarti direttamente nel futuro
description.en: Discover the secrets of Artificial Intelligence and the systems that will allow you to project yourself directly into the future.
description.es: Descubre los secretos de la Inteligencia Artificial y los sistemas que te permitirán proyectarte directamente al futuro.

courses.time: The course is available from 6:00 PM
courses.nature: Deepen your understanding of Scrum and Agile methodologies for project management.

courses.title: SQL

description.it: Acquisire competenze nell’uso del linguaggio SQL per gestire, interrogare e manipolare database relazionali in modo efficiente ed efficace.
description.en: Acquire skills in using SQL language to manage, query, and manipulate relational databases efficiently and effectively.
description.es: Adquiere habilidades en el uso del lenguaje SQL para gestionar, consultar y manipular bases de datos relacionales de manera eficiente y efectiva.

courses.title: Data Warehousing

description.it: Approfondire i concetti di Data Warehousing, dalla progettazione alla gestione, ottimizzazione e sicurezza.
description.en: Deepen your understanding of Data Warehousing concepts, from design to management, optimization, and security.
description.es: Profundiza en los conceptos de Data Warehousing, desde el diseño hasta la gestión, optimización y seguridad.
